price: Yanã ɓõyẽwa daga mutãne dõmin mũnin abin da aka yimasa bushãra da shi. Shin, zai riƙe shi a kan wulãkanci kõ zai turbuɗe shi a cikin turɓãya To, abin da suke hukuntãwa ya mũnana.
arabic: يَتَوَٰرَىٰ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ مِن سُوٓءِ مَا بُشِّرَ بِهِۦٓۚ أَيُمۡسِكُهُۥ عَلَىٰ هُونٍ أَمۡ يَدُسُّهُۥ فِي ٱلتُّرَابِۗ أَلَا سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yatawārā mina al-qawmi min sūi mā bushira bihi ayum'sikuhu ʿalā hūnin am yadussuhu fī al-turābi alā sāa mā yaḥkumūna
translations: he has been given good news
